SORE ARM; ITCHY ARM; FEVER OF 103.7 F; QUEASY; VOMITING; CHILLS; BLACKED OUT AND ASKED WHERE HER CLOTHES WERE FROM AFTER HER DAUGHTER CHANGED HER CLOTHES; SHE COULDNT FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS TO STAND UP/ KNEES BUCKLING; SHE GOT CONFUSED AND LOST HER ABILITY TO WALK AND SIT DOWN; LOST HER ABILITY TO WALK AND SIT DOWN; A spontaneous report was received from a consumer, a 75-year-old, female patient, who received Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine (mRNA-1273) and experienced loss of consciousness, chills, queasy, vomiting, fever of 103.7F, sore and itchy arms, confusion, lost ability to walk and sit down, knees were buckling, blacked out. The patient's medical history was not provided. Concomitant products known to have been used by the patient, within two weeks prior to the events were quetiapine, atorvastatin 10mg, tramadol, hydrocodone/APAP 5/325mg, gabapentin 300mg, Tylenol PM 500mg, Voltaren cream, Miralax. On 10 Feb 2021, the patient received their first of two planned doses of mRNA-1273 (Lot number: 030M20A) intramuscularly in the right deltoid muscle for prophylaxis of COVID-19 infection. On 11 Feb 2021, next day after exposure to the first dose, the patient experienced, chills, queasy, vomiting, fever of 103.7F which went down to 100F. On 12 Feb 2021 (Friday) the patient had sore and itchy arms and lost the ability to walk and sit down to extend that was carried to the bathroom. The patient got confusion, knees were buckling and even blacked out. Lab exam performed were reported as GRF-21%. Treatment for the event included Aleve and Nyquil. Action taken with mRNA-1273 in response to the events was unknown. The outcome of the events, chills, queasy, vomiting, fever of 103.7F, sore and itchy arms, confusion, lost ability to walk and sit down, knees were buckling and black out was considered to be recovered/ resolved.; Reporter's Comments: This case concerns a 75-year-old female who had serious unexpected loss of consciousness, dysstasia, gait disturbance, confusional state and nonserious expected pyrexia, chills, nausea, vomiting, injection site pain, injection site pruritus. Event onset 3 days after first dose mRNA-1273. Treatment with naproxen. Events resolved. Based on current available information and temporal association between use of the product and the start date of the event, a causal relationship cannot be excluded.
75 2021-04-12 loss of consciousness, atrial fibrillation Diagnosed with an A-Fib; She went to pick up a glass of water, and she does not remember dropping th... Read more
Close
Diagnosed with an A-Fib; She went to pick up a glass of water, and she does not remember dropping the glass but it crashed to the floor and it broke. She does not remember anything about that; A very strange thing happened; Had a very violent reaction; This spontaneous case was reported by a consumer (subsequently medically confirmed) and describes the occurrence of ATRIAL FIBRILLATION (Diagnosed with an A-Fib) and LOSS OF CONSCIOUSNESS (She went to pick up a glass of water, and she does not remember dropping the glass but it crashed to the floor and it broke. She does not remember anything about that) in a 75-year-old female patient who received mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) for COVID-19 vaccination. The occurrence of additional non-serious events is detailed below. Concurrent medical conditions included Penicillin allergy and Allergy NOS (morphin). On 04-Feb-2021, the patient received first dose of mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (Intramuscular) 1 dosage form. On 04-Mar-2021, received second dose of mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (Intramuscular) dosage was changed to 1 dosage form. On 14-Feb-2021, the patient experienced ATRIAL FIBRILLATION (Diagnosed with an A-Fib) (seriousness criterion hospitalization), LOSS OF CONSCIOUSNESS (She went to pick up a glass of water, and she does not remember dropping the glass but it crashed to the floor and it broke. She does not remember anything about that) (seriousness criterion medically significant), FEELING ABNORMAL (A very strange thing happened) and VACCINATION COMPLICATION (Had a very violent reaction). At the time of the report, ATRIAL FIBRILLATION (Diagnosed with an A-Fib), LOSS OF CONSCIOUSNESS (She went to pick up a glass of water, and she does not remember dropping the glass but it crashed to the floor and it broke. She does not remember anything about that), FEELING ABNORMAL (A very strange thing happened) and VACCINATION COMPLICATION (Had a very violent reaction) had not resolved. DIAGNOSTIC RESULTS (normal ranges are provided in parenthesis if available): On an unknown date, Electrocardiogram: atrial fibrillation (abnormal) Atrial fibrillation. Concomitant medications include natural fibroid 60 mg, Biestrogen (Hormone regulator). Treatment medication include unknown intravenous medication. Based on the current information and temporal association between the use of the product and the start date of the events a causal relationship cannot be excluded.; Sender's Comments: Based on the current information and temporal association between the use of the product and the start date of the events a causal relationship cannot be excluded.
75 2021-04-13 cerebral haemorrhage Acute brain hemmorhage
75 2021-04-17 loss of consciousness In the middle of the night after second innoculation found myself on the floor next to my bed. I ha... Read more
Close
In the middle of the night after second innoculation found myself on the floor next to my bed. I have no idea how I got there and was not aware of who I has or how I got there. I don't remember how I got to the floor and didn't remember falling out of bed. The next morning my right hip was very sore, so I concluded I had been unconcious ancd fell out of bed I'm reporting this on the hope that cases ofothers who had similar cases can help me understand. I believe my case is unusual and severe, I live alone and I could have been fatally injured
75 2021-04-17 ischaemic stroke, cerebrovascular accident Patient was admitted with left sided weakness consistent with stroke. Stroke was nonhemorrhagic on C... Read more
Close
Patient was admitted with left sided weakness consistent with stroke. Stroke was nonhemorrhagic on CT scan. MRI could not be done due to presence of pacemaker. Stroke is presumed embolic or ischemic, surprising given pt is on both pradaxa and plavix and is compliant.
75 2021-04-22 loss of consciousness hurt her head; fell unconscious in the bathroom; trying to say few words; Flu like symptoms; chills ... Read more
Close
hurt her head; fell unconscious in the bathroom; trying to say few words; Flu like symptoms; chills and teeth were shattering; This spontaneous case was reported by a consumer (subsequently medically confirmed) and describes the occurrence of HEAD INJURY (hurt her head) and LOSS OF CONSCIOUSNESS (fell unconscious in the bathroom) in a 75-year-old female patient who received mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) for COVID-19 vaccination. The occurrence of additional non-serious events is detailed below. The patient's past medical history included No adverse event (No medical history reported). On 06-Apr-2021, the patient received first dose of mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (Intramuscular) 2 dosage form. On 06-Apr-2021, the patient experienced INFLUENZA LIKE ILLNESS (Flu like symptoms) and CHILLS (chills and teeth were shattering). On 07-Apr-2021, the patient experienced HEAD INJURY (hurt her head) (seriousness criterion hospitalization), LOSS OF CONSCIOUSNESS (fell unconscious in the bathroom) (seriousness criterion medically significant) and DYSARTHRIA (trying to say few words). The patient was hospitalized from 07-Apr-2021 to 08-Apr-2021 due to HEAD INJURY. On 06-Apr-2021, INFLUENZA LIKE ILLNESS (Flu like symptoms) and CHILLS (chills and teeth were shattering) had resolved. On 07-Apr-2021, LOSS OF CONSCIOUSNESS (fell unconscious in the bathroom) and DYSARTHRIA (trying to say few words) had resolved. At the time of the report, HEAD INJURY (hurt her head) outcome was unknown. The action taken with mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (Intramuscular) was unknown. Patient reported getting an IV and other medications in the hospital, however not aware of which medications were given for treatment.; Sender's Comments: Very limited information regarding these events has been provided at this time. Further information is required. Causality for the events flu-like symptoms and chills is possible.
75 2021-04-22 pallor kidney failure; not feeling well; shaking; pale; weak; headache; 101.5F fever; This spontaneous case... Read more
Close
kidney failure; not feeling well; shaking; pale; weak; headache; 101.5F fever; This spontaneous case was reported by a consumer and describes the occurrence of RENAL FAILURE (kidney failure) in a 75-year-old female patient who received mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) for COVID-19 vaccination. The occurrence of additional non-serious events is detailed below. The patient's past medical history included Kidney failure on 14-Apr-2021. On 14-Apr-2021, the patient received second dose of mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (Intramuscular) 2 dosage form. On 14-Apr-2021, the patient experienced RENAL FAILURE (kidney failure) (seriousness criterion medically significant), MALAISE (not feeling well), TREMOR (shaking), PALLOR (pale), ASTHENIA (weak), HEADACHE (headache) and PYREXIA (101.5F fever). At the time of the report, RENAL FAILURE (kidney failure), MALAISE (not feeling well), TREMOR (shaking), PALLOR (pale), ASTHENIA (weak), HEADACHE (headache) and PYREXIA (101.5F fever) outcome was unknown. DIAGNOSTIC RESULTS (normal ranges are provided in parenthesis if available): On an unknown date, Body temperature: 101.5f (High) 101.5F. The action taken with mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (Intramuscular) was unknown. Company Comment Based on the current available information and temporal association between the use of the product and the start date of the events, a causal relationship cannot be excluded. Reporter did not allow further contact
75 2021-04-26 cerebrovascular accident possibility of having a stroke; severe neurological symptoms; difficulty with her speech (can think ... Read more
Close
possibility of having a stroke; severe neurological symptoms; difficulty with her speech (can think of the word, but could not get it out); she had gait problems; Missed dose; This spontaneous case was reported by a consumer and describes the occurrence of CEREBROVASCULAR ACCIDENT (possibility of having a stroke), NEUROLOGICAL SYMPTOM (severe neurological symptoms), SPEECH DISORDER (difficulty with her speech (can think of the word, but could not get it out)) and GAIT DISTURBANCE (she had gait problems) in a 75-year-old female patient who received mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (batch no. 030M20A) for COVID-19 vaccination. The occurrence of additional non-serious events is detailed below. Concomitant products included AMLODIPINE, MORPHINE SULFATE, AMITRIPTYLINE, METFORMIN, GABAPENTIN, LOSARTAN, CLOPIDOGREL, PANTOPRAZOLE, RISPERIDONE, DAILYVIT WOMEN 50+, INSULIN HUMAN INJECTION, ISOPHANE (NOVOLIN N) and INSULIN ASPART for an unknown indication. On 20-Feb-2021, the patient received first dose of mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (Intramuscular) 1 dosage form. On 21-Feb-2021, the patient experienced CEREBROVASCULAR ACCIDENT (possibility of having a stroke) (seriousness criterion hospitalization), NEUROLOGICAL SYMPTOM (severe neurological symptoms) (seriousness criterion hospitalization), SPEECH DISORDER (difficulty with her speech (can think of the word, but could not get it out)) (seriousness criterion hospitalization) and GAIT DISTURBANCE (she had gait problems) (seriousness criterion hospitalization). On an unknown date, the patient experienced PRODUCT DOSE OMISSION ISSUE (Missed dose ). The patient was hospitalized on 21-Feb-2021 due to CEREBROVASCULAR ACCIDENT, GAIT DISTURBANCE, NEUROLOGICAL SYMPTOM and SPEECH DISORDER. On 10-Mar-2021, CEREBROVASCULAR ACCIDENT (possibility of having a stroke), NEUROLOGICAL SYMPTOM (severe neurological symptoms), SPEECH DISORDER (difficulty with her speech (can think of the word, but could not get it out)) and GAIT DISTURBANCE (she had gait problems) had resolved. At the time of the report, PRODUCT DOSE OMISSION ISSUE (Missed dose ) had resolved. The action taken with mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (Intramuscular) was unknown. Treatment information was not provided. Company comment:Based on the information provided which includes a temporal association between the use of mRNA-1273 vaccine and onset of the reported events, a causal relationship cannot be excluded. Further information has been requested.; Sender's Comments: Based on the information provided which includes a temporal association between the use of mRNA-1273 vaccine and onset of the reported events, a causal relationship cannot be excluded. Further information has been requested.
75 2021-04-30 cerebral haemorrhage, heart rate increased, blood pressure fluctuation Redness at the area of the injection, the size of an egg; COVID arm; Dizzy spell; Fall; Brain bleed;... Read more
Close
Redness at the area of the injection, the size of an egg; COVID arm; Dizzy spell; Fall; Brain bleed; Intermittent episodes of high blood pressure; Intermittent episodes of rapid heartbeat; Difficulty sleeping; Headaches; soreness at the site of the injection; Flushing in her face; Humming in the ears; This spontaneous case was reported by a consumer (subsequently medically confirmed) and describes the occurrence of CEREBRAL HAEMORRHAGE (Brain bleed) in a 75-year-old female patient who received mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (batch no. 032L20A) for COVID-19 vaccination. The occurrence of additional non-serious events is detailed below. No Medical History information was reported. On 25-Jan-2021, the patient received first dose of mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (Intramuscular) 1 dosage form. On 25-Jan-2021, the patient experienced FLUSHING (Flushing in her face). 25-Jan-2021, the patient experienced VACCINATION SITE PAIN (soreness at the site of the injection). On 27-Jan-2021, the patient experienced BLOOD PRESSURE FLUCTUATION (Intermittent episodes of high blood pressure), HEART RATE INCREASED (Intermittent episodes of rapid heartbeat), INSOMNIA (Difficulty sleeping) and HEADACHE (Headaches). On 29-Jan-2021, the patient experienced CEREBRAL HAEMORRHAGE (Brain bleed) (seriousness criterion medically significant), DIZZINESS (Dizzy spell) and FALL (Fall). On 02-Feb-2021, the patient experienced TYPE IV HYPERSENSITIVITY REACTION (COVID arm). On 04-Feb-2021, the patient experienced VACCINATION SITE ERYTHEMA (Redness at the area of the injection, the size of an egg). On an unknown date, the patient experienced TINNITUS (Humming in the ears). On 25-Jan-2021, FLUSHING (Flushing in her face) and VACCINATION SITE PAIN (soreness at the site of the injection) had resolved. On 10-Feb-2021, TYPE IV HYPERSENSITIVITY REACTION (COVID arm) had resolved. At the time of the report, CEREBRAL HAEMORRHAGE (Brain bleed), DIZZINESS (Dizzy spell), FALL (Fall) and VACCINATION SITE ERYTHEMA (Redness at the area of the injection, the size of an egg) outcome was unknown and BLOOD PRESSURE FLUCTUATION (Intermittent episodes of high blood pressure), HEART RATE INCREASED (Intermittent episodes of rapid heartbeat), TINNITUS (Humming in the ears), INSOMNIA (Difficulty sleeping) and HEADACHE (Headaches) had resolved. DIAGNOSTIC RESULTS (normal ranges are provided in parenthesis if available): On 01-Feb-2021, Electrocardiogram: normal (normal) Normal. On 01-Feb-2021, Magnetic resonance imaging: normal (normal) Normal. The action taken with mRNA-1273 (Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine) (Intramuscular) was unknown. Concomitant product use was not reported. Treatment included steroids. Based on the current available information and temporal association between the use of the product and the start date of the events, a causal relationship cannot be excluded. Most recent FOLLOW-UP information incorporated above includes: On 21-Apr-2021: New events of blood pressure fluctuation, heart rate increased, headache, Covid arm, tinnitus, dizziness, fall, insomnia, and cerebral haemorrhage (serious) added; case upgraded to serious; Labs coded; treatment information added.; Sender's Comments: Based on the current available information and temporal association between the use of the product and the start date of the events, a causal relationship cannot be excluded.
75 2021-05-03 chest discomfort Pt had an appointment with her cardiologist 4/15/2021 and no changes in patient's health noted state... Read more
Close
Pt had an appointment with her cardiologist 4/15/2021 and no changes in patient's health noted states daughter. Patient performed yard work at noon 4/16/2021 and developed chest tightness that was relieved by rest. After patient's nap at noon no more chest discomfort occurred. Patient went to bed that night and husband noted she was sleeping comfortbly with no breathing difficulties at midnight. At 3 am husband found patient cold and she had expired.
